required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Safety and Pharmacokinetics Study in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1b/2 Multiple-Dose Safety Study and Pharmacokinetic/ Pharmacodynamic Study of LY2189102 in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to examine the safety and efficacy of this antibody in rheumatoid arthritis patients.
Part A of the study is an initial dose escalation phase
Part B of the study is a randomized allocation of the entire dosing group to parallel treatment assignments

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: To examine the safety and tolerability of LY2189102 administered as multiple doses to RA patients who are receiving stable doses of MTX.
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, day 1, day 7, day 14, day 21, day 28, day 35, day 63, day 98

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize LY2189102 pharmacokinetics during repeated dosing in RA patients who are taking concomitant MTX.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, day 1, day 14, day 28, day 35, day 63

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize relationships between LY2189102 dose, exposure, and responses of clinical measures of disease activity - Simple Disease Activity Index (SDAI)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, day 1, day 7, day 21, day 28, day 35, day 63, day 98

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize relationships between LY2189102 dose, exposure, and responses of clinical measures of disease activity -Disease Activity Score (based on 28 joint count) (DAS28)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, day 1, day 7, day 14, day 28, day 35, day 63, day 98

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize relationships between LY2189102 dose, exposure, and responses of clinical measures of disease activity -biomarkers (for example, C-reactive protein [CRP] and other biomarkers of inflammation and /or structural damage
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, day 1, day 7, day 14, day 28, day 35, day 63, day 98

secondary_outcome.measure: To characterize relationships between LY2189102 dose, exposure, and responses of clinical measures of disability (Health Assessment Questionnaire [HAQ])

arm_group.description: Part A:2X Loading dose, then 0.1mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV Part B:2X Loading dose, then 0.02mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV
Part A:2X Loading dose, then 0.3mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV Part B:2X Loading dose, then 0.15mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV
Part A: 2X Loading dose, then 1.0mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV Part B: 2X Loading dose, then 1.0mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV
Part A:2X Loading dose, then 2.5mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV Part B:2X Loading dose, then 2.5mg/kg/wk X 4wks, IV

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis
- regular use of methotrexate
- active rheumatoid arthritis
Exclusion Criteria:
- Juvenile Rheumatoid Arthritis
- evidence of tuberculosis
- women who are pregnant or become pregnant during study, or are breast-feeding
